Motor Safe Wearble Helmet

Project

A wearble helmet for motorcycle drivers paired with an app. This app helps drivers stay safer by tracking their routes and being informed of upcoming road conditions and weather.

They can also view and share videos that were taken during their drives. Another feature allows for those riding together the option to bluetooth connect with nearby riders.
